stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int[][] mat = {{1, 2, 3, 4},
               {5, 6, 7, 8},
               {8, 7, 6, 5},
               {4, 3, 2, 1}};

for (int r = 0; r < mat.length; r++) 
{ 
   /* missing code */ 
}

 

This code segment is intended to produce the following output.

 

1 
5 6 
8 7 6 
4 3 2 1

choicesHtml:
for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[c][r] + " ");
}
System.out.println();

for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " "); 
}
System.out.println();

for (int c = 1; c < r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " ");
} 
System.out.println();

for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{ 
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " "); 
   System.out.println(); 
}
